title: Broken Sword 2 [MAC] - The Smoking Mirror (Remastered)
description:
Broken Sword 2 [MAC] - The Smoking Mirror (Remastered)

Multilingual (Speech and voices): English, French, German, Spanish e Italian

Just unzip and enjoy!


Note: Sometimes the app can crash (remember to save)... this game hasn't be uploaded by me, i am just distributing it! ;)
